thread.title: Sheryl Saboriendo

author: Sheryl Saboriendo
title: Sheryl Saboriendo
text:
My husband and I got married last year and we got a new place this year. We wanted it to be memorable and nostalgic and I opted to seek canvas print services. I am just so thankful I came across Canvasdiscount. To be fair, many people commented about the quality of the photo upon printing their canvasses. But I believe it's the size and quality of the picture they uploaded. Mine was perfect.
And to this day, I have my 3 huge canvasses posted on the wall of my living room, and I still smile everytime I look at it. I remember our families and our wedding day. ALSO! Shipping was superb and unexpected. It came so fast, less than the days indicated. It also packaged very well and upon opening, it was tightly secured. I wish I can share you my wall and see my canvas prints. It's lovely.
Will definitely get more canvas photos from this company! More power!
